ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying in the Sakyan country at Kapilavatthu in the Banyan Tree Monastery.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.2_0: Then Mahāpajāpatī Gotamī went to the Fortunate One,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.2_1: They then went to him and stop him, saying,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.4_0: But, as easily as a strong person would extend or contract their arm, the Buddha, together with the mendicant Saṅgha, vanished from the near shore and landed on the far shore.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.5_0: “Well then, the nuns should clean themselves with water.” And the Buddha instructed, inspired, and gladdened her with a teaching,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.6_0: after which she bowed down, circumambulated him with her right side toward him, and left.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.7_0: After giving a teaching, the Buddha addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.8_0: “Monks, I allow the nuns to clean themselves with water.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.1_0: Being aware that the Buddha had allowed cleaning with water,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.2_0: Knowing that the Buddha had prohibited cleanliness due to water, they too try to get pure water.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.3_0: She told the nuns what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.4_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.5_0: “How can a nun clean herself too deeply with water?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.6_0: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.9_0: “... How can a nun do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.10_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.11_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.12.1_0: ‘If a nun is cleaning herself with water, she may insert two finger joints at the most.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.12.1_1: If she goes beyond that, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.2_0: washing the vagina is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.3_0: if she first takes hold of her;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.5_0: He should insert two finger joints:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.6_0: she may insert two joints of two fingers at the most.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.8_0: if she consents to the contact and goes beyond even by a hair’s breadth, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.1_0: If it is more than two finger joints, and she perceives it as more, and she inserts them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.2_0: If it is more than two finger joints, but she is unsure of it, and she inserts them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.3_0: If it is more than two finger joints, but she perceives it as less, and she inserts them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.4_0: If it is less than two finger joints, but she perceives it as more, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.5_0: If it is less than two finger joints, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.2.6_0: If it is less than two finger joints, and she perceives it as less, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.2_0: if she inserts two finger joints;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.3_0: if she inserts less than two finger joints;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.6_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.3.7_0: The fifth training rule is finished.
